title: Hongjun Kim
text:
Welcome!

Hello! my name is Hongjun Kim, I am a third year student at UCSB studying Statistics and Data Science. Extremely Intrigued by Data Science, Machine Learning (AI), and Data Architect.

Education

Bachelors degree in Statistics and Data Science at UC Santa Barbara.
Expected to graduate June 2025.

title: About
text:
Let me introduce myself!

My name is Hongjun Kim, I am a first generation immigrant from South Korea. I have lived and studied in the United States since 2010. I graduated from Granada Hills Charter High School back in 2020. Attended Los Angeles Pierce College to get Associateâ€™s degree then transferred to UC Santa Barbara. I am Native in Korean, English and Limited Working Proficiency in Spanish.

Educational Background

I am experienced in multiple languages of coding: C++, R, Python, SQL, and Java.
